fields.name: attempts
fields.label: Attempts
fields.description: Number of attempts a user has to complete the content.

fields.name: timeLimit
fields.label: Time limit
fields.description: Optional time limit in seconds. If a user exceeds this time, the exercise cannot be edited anymore.

fields.name: globalTimeLimit
fields.label: Global time limit
fields.description: Optional global time limit in seconds. If a user exceeds this time, all the exercises cannot be edited anymore.

fields.name: cycle
fields.label: Cycle through contents
fields.description: Go back to first item after last and vide versa.

fields.name: pageAnnouncement
fields.label: Page announcement
fields.description: @current and @total are placeholders and will be replaced by the respective values.

fields.name: timeExpiredExercise
fields.label: Time expired for exercise
fields.default: You ran out of time for this exercise!

fields.name: timeExpiredGlobal
fields.label: Time expired for global
fields.default: You ran out of time for this content!

fields.name: previousContentDisabled
fields.label: Previous content disabled
fields.default: Going to previous content is currently not possible.

fields.name: nextContentDisabled
fields.label: Next content disabled
fields.default: Going to next content is currently not possible.

fields.name: movedTo
fields.label: Moved to page
fields.description: @current and @total are placeholders and will be replaced by the respective values.
